entry.tran: 言语得体的;谈吐文雅的
entry.def: A well-spoken person speaks in a polite correct way and with an accent which is considered socially acceptable.

example.ex: I remember her as a quiet, hard-working and well-spoken girl.
example.tran: 我记得她是个安静、勤奋并且谈吐优雅的女孩子。

means.word_mean: 1. speaking or spoken fittingly or pleasingly;

sentences.sentence: "a few well-spoken words on civic pride"

auth_sentence.content: Mrs. Snyder has a pleasing presence and is well-spoken.
